subject: Parenting

description: A quick, practical guide to First Words.

hook.text: A baby says 'mama' and the room erupts. But was it a real word or just babbling?

discovery.text: True first words arrive near twelve months, when babies link a sound to a specific thing.

twist.text: Most babies understand fifty words before they can say even one.

punchline.text: They understand long before they speak.
